snippet: The Japanese financial firm has sought to build its team in the region, which still generates the largest amount of investment banking fees worldwide.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The Japanese financial firm has sought to build its team in the region, which still generates the largest amount of investment banking fees worldwide.

headline.main: Nomura Hires Six Bankers in Effort to Expand in Americas
